transform_def.name: division
transform_def.string: let r = weight * if unit_rnd_0 > 0.5 then length(p_in) else (1 / length(p_in)) a = atan2(p_in.y, p_in.y / p_in.x) o0 = (if unit_rnd_0 < 0.5 then vec2(sin(a), cos(a)) else vec2(cos(a), sin(a))) * r o1 = if o0.y > 0.0 then vec2(-o0.x, o0.y) else o0 o2 = if o1.x > 0.0 then vec2(o1.x, -o1.y) else o1 in if switch > 0.0 then o0 else if o2.y > 0.0 then vec2(-o2.x, o2.y) else o2
